inn1.comm: left alone outside off stump to begin.
and again no shot played to that one
down the leg side off the pads and to the keeper, appeal but nothing given
finds the edge and it's a wonderful flying catch by Kevin O'Brien diving to his left at second slip, good start for Ireland
no shot played again and through to Wilson
lofted straight drive, mistimed but it's the first runs of the innings
flicked down to fine leg
down the leg side
play and miss outside off stump
steered to Portefield at midwicket
driven back to the bowler, well fielded by Sorensen
pushes at that one, doesen't find the edge though
flicked away out towards deep midwicket
lets that one go through to Wilson
defended into the off side, accurate so far from Murtagh
not too far from the edge once again, batsman not looking comfortable
pushed to mid-off and it's fielded with ease
thick edge which goes towards backward point
blocked away to mid-off and that's a maiden
flicked away toward cow corner for a couple
inside edge onto the pads and out to point
back of a length and it's pushed back to the bowler
steered away and Joyce can't stop it at gully
no shot played there and Wilson collects
blocked back to Sorensen, better over this time
another one that is left alone
defended into the leg side and that's another dot
strays towards leg there and it's turned to fine leg for a single
driven well but it's stopped by Thompson coming in from mid-off
pushed again into the off side and again Thompson fields
played off the back foot and again the man at mid-off fields
blocked away towards mid-on
no shot played to that delivery
and again that's left alone. tight stuff from Ireland
widish but batsman isn't tempted into a shot
mis-timed drive into midwicket and Dockrell fields
defended into the leg side and that completes another tight over
quick single taken in the covers
defended out towards point
flicked away into the leg side and mid-on comes round to field
perfect length for the batsman and he duly smashes it away to long-off for the first boundary
defended back to the bowler
no shot played and Wilson gathers
loses the line and it's swiftly guided down to fine leg
short and wide and it's pulled away to cow corner, a poor delivery is punished
fantastic cover drive and the Sri Lankan fans begin to make some noise
struck high on the pads, better delivery from Sorensen
tries another drive but doesen't catch this one and it's well fielded in the covers
turned away towards midwicket
defended into the off side
driven firmly to mid-off
and the change works, flashing drive and it finds a thin outside edge which Wilson takes
flicked away down to fine leg to get off the mark
quick single taken in the leg side
Murtagh switches end and it's left alone by the batsman
pushes it into the off side
edged but it just didn't carry to first slip, although perhaps Wilson could have got it
turned away fine for a single, Wilson didn't move for that last chance, a dive may have gathered that edge
no shot played and Wilson collects
defended into the off side
defended into the covers
accurate line and length and it can only be blocked into the off side
pushed at that and it's not too far from the edge
leaves that well alone, good delivery
hit away but not timed and mid-on fields
pushed towward cover, thinks about a single but his partner sends him back
pushed into the off side, and the Irish skipper comes in to field
again it's a good accurate delivery and it can only be prodded to mid-off
great stop by Porterfield at mid-on prevents more runs
driven firmly but directly to cover
played off the back foot into the covers
plays and misses to that one, Irish fielders roar their encouragement
no shot played to that one
driven into the covers
nicely flicked all the way to the cow corner boundary
very similar shot but this time it's pulled in just before reaching the rope
driven straight and they pick up a single
another single straight, and a good over for Sri Lanka
no shot played and it goes through to Wilson
driven softly into the covers
flicked away into the leg side
driven directly to mid-off
short and down the leg side
finds his line again and it's blocked into the covers
quick single taken to mid-on, some confusion with the running but Murtagh fails to pick up, possible run out chance
played back to the bowler, batsman sets off for reasons only known to himself, Cusack misses with his throw, may have been close
turned into the leg side for a single
steered down to third man for another single
pushed into the leg side and mid-on fields
comes down the pitch and touch and hits a lovely straight drive all the way to the boundary
bit shorter and it's defended on the back foot back to the bowler
quick single to mid-on, good cricket
smashing cover drive which is beautifully timed and it beats the fielder to the rope
wristily flicked to deep square leg
stops the bleeding there as the batsman leaves that alone
blocked away into the covers
strays down leg and it's turned to fine leg
pushed into the off side to a short cover
tunred towards midwicket where Dockrell fields
blocked towards mid-off
cracked away but the sweeper prevents the boundary
fullish delivery which is blocked towards cover
defended back to the bowler, decent over from Sorensen
no run, down the leg side
driven firmly but big Kevin O'Brien makes a good stop
widish but the batsman watches it go by
quick single taken in the leg side, Niall O'Brien elects not to have a shy at the stumps
played to mid-off where the Irish skipper fields
single taken to fine leg
and a breathrough, pushes at a widish one with not a lot of confidence and a this edge is found, he walks as Thompson celebrates
defended into the leg side
turned firmly to deep midwicket
dabbed down to backward point and there's nothing there
defended back to the bowler
pushed towards mid-on
hit hard but nicely stopped by Sorensen off his own bowling, another good over from Ireland
smashed but a fantastic stop by Porterfield at backward point, he really is a marvellous fielder
turned away this time out to deep midwicket
flicked backward of square and Joyce fields
hammered through the covers and the sweeper fields
mis-timed drive towards mid-off, skipper does not look too comfortable at the moment
hit hard in the air and Thompson dives and just gets his hand to it, would have been the catch of the decade, flies then straight to the rope
defended into the leg side
turned away out to cow corner for a couple
blocked back to the bowler
driven directly to Kevin O'Brien at cover
pushed to mid-on and it's another dot
played out to deep midwicket and they refuse the second run
plays and misses a leg side flick
does not get the sweep perfect but it's enough for a single
forward defensive played to that one
played off the back foot and it's well fielded by the bowler
just tapped into the leg side and the non-striker is called back
defended into the leg side, nice start for Dockrell
played through a vacant midwicket for a single
full and he plays at that late but gets it away and into the covers in time
defedned off the back foot and a loud shout of 'NO' from the skipper as a fielder comes running in from the leg side
hit hard and it's a great stop by Cusack to prevent maybe four runs
nice accurate stuff and it can only be defended back to the bowler
fielded by Sorensen at mid-on
flicked very fine and the man is up stopping the single
dangerous single taken to a short cover, the throw is ok and Wilson removes the bails, appeal but the umpire is unmoved, no tv replay here
defended into the off side
and another forward defensive played to that one
nearly gets through his defenses but it hits him on the body, another good over from the young spinner
played towards mid-on
driven into the covers and Dockrell judges it well to stop a run
big swing of the bat but it misses everything and through to Wilson who is standing up to the stumps
blocked away into the off side
quick single taken to mid-off, Dockrell hits the stumps but he was home
dances down the track and hammers it past mid-off and to the rope
swept to deep backward square and it's well fielded at the rope by Kevin O'Brien
steered down to long-off
too short and it's easily pulled away to deep midwicket
better delivery and it's blocked away
misjudges that completely and an edge is almost found
left alone and Wilson also stands up to the stumps for O'Brien
big swing and miss by the batsman
driven to mid-on, Matthews wanted one but is sent back
driven to Joyce at mid-off, they are home but Joyce hits the stumps, they get an overthrow
down the leg side and half hearted appeal for an edge
turned into the leg side for a single
defended on the back foot to a short cover
pushed back to the bowler
comes down the pitch and calmly plays it to long-off
defended into the covers
hacked away out to the sweeper in the deep
pushed back to Dockrell, bit uppish but it does not come near to carrying
pushed back towards the bowler
strays leg side and it's guided to fine leg
hit hard but in the air back to the bowler and he stoops down and plucks it out of the air, the second brilliant catch by Kevin O'Brien this innings
no shot played to begin his innings
almost lazily drives him through the covers, lovely shot
flicked behind square leg for a single
turned into the midwicket region and the non-striker is called back by his skipper
well stopped by Porterfield at cover
and another one goes, Stirling finds the outside and edge and Joyce takes a simple catch at first slip, Sri Lanka in some bother
comes down the pitch but defends
again comes down the pitch and defends, trying to avoid the leg before
defended into the leg side, Stirling with a crucial strike in that over
way down the leg side and the keeper can't collect
big lbw appeal but the umpire is unmoved, outside the line of off stump perhaps
tapped into the leg side and the batsman is sent back by his partner
defended back to the bowler
and again it's just blocked away, pressure building
inside edge which loops off the pads and into midwicket to bring up the hundred
quick single taken to point
defended into the off side
cut away to backward point
forward defensive into the leg side
shorter and it's cuts away through the off side and to the rope, boundary to lift the siege
confusion with the running but Matthews gets back in time
flicked towards square leg
blocked back towards the bowler
turned through midwicket for another single
well stopped by Porterfield in the covers
played softly to mid-on
played softly to mid-on
quick single taken in the leg side
and again it's flicked in to the leg side for a single
tries the same but it is directly to Porterfield this time
turned fine but the man is up
played back to the bowler, Sri Lankan drums at the ground begin to stir again
defended into midwicket to complete another tight over
comes down the pitch and lofts it to cow corner for a boundary, one bounce and four
does not take the bait this time and defends back to the bowler
driven softly into the covers
played out to deep midwicket
guided down to long-on
bit of nurdling going on now, pushed out to the sweeper
turned to square leg
pushed back to the bowler
down the leg side
played down to long-on
again it's turned into the leg side
pushed back to bowler
quick single taken to mid-on as Murtagh returns
cut away but directly to point
quick single taken in the midwicket region
pushed through extra cover
dabbed down towards point
flicked toward Dockrell at midwicket and he prevents a single
turned towards square leg
swept away in the air and Joyce is trying to get there, he dives but just gets his finger tips to it, and it deflects away to the rope
steered down to long-on
plays and misses as Wilson removes the bails, no stumping there though
hacked away through backward point
played back to bowler
and a brilliant bit of work by Niall O'Brien as Matthews gets himself in a muddle being sent back his partner, O'Brien lofts lovely throw from short fine leg
well stopped in the covers by Stirling
steered down to third man
left alone by the batsman
another is left alone
defended into the leg side
pushed out through covers
well stopped by Niall O'Brien at midwicket
driven firmly to cover and it's well stopped
turned into the leg side
single taken to a short fine leg
turned through midwicket for a single
hits it on the up through the covers and to the rope, cracking shot
guided down to third man
in the slot and he slogs it down the ground and it's over the sidescreen and out of the ground
hacked away but straight to Porterfield at backward point
too far outside off that time
just helped on it's way to the third man boundary and it's a disastrous over for Ireland
flicked to the man at midwicket
just prodded towards point for the single
turned through square leg
driven through extra cover for a couple
steered down to a short third man
pushed back to the bowler
comes down the track, hits it towards mid-on and falls over, preventing him from taking a run
pushed back to the bowler
tries to hammer him down the ground but he only picks out Ed Joyce at long-on who gathers a nice catch
pushed back to the bowler
hammered to Joyce again, good shot for no run
pulled to deep backward square
pushed back to the bowler
guided down to long-on
and driven down there again
flicked down to fine leg
pushed down to long-off
defended back to the bowler
pushed into the off side
turned to a short fine leg and there's no run
sweep slog over deep backward square for anotehr maximum
defended into the leg side
flicked to deep backward square
steered down to third man
fuller ball which is played at late but is eventually blocked away into the covers
comes down the pitch but can only hit it toward mid-on
didn't move his feet trying to slog it over deep midwicket but he can't beat  Dockrell who takes the regulation catch at the rope
inside edge which just evades the stumps
no shot played to that one
inside edge down to fine leg
cracked off the back foot down to long-on
too short and it's cut away through point and to the rope
that is a lot better and the batsman can only block it back to the bowler
lofted heave down the ground but it bounces safe and they scramble a run
slog sweep which is chased all the way to the rope by Thompson
and another down the ground this time and a big over for Sri Lanka
smahsed away again over extra cover and to the rope
smashed down to long-on
flicked out to deep backward square
pulled out towards cow corner
steered backward of point for another single
way down the leg side and it flies to the rope, costly runs here
pulled out to cow corner for another single
down the leg side once again
hooked away to deep midwicket, another very expensive over
whacked down to long-on for a single
baseball type shot down to long-off, unconventional in the extreme
flicks the pads and through to the keeper
short and wide and it's smacked through backward, Ireland's death bowling letting them down once gain
driven down to long-on for a couple
quick single down to a short fine leg

inn2.comm: Ireland's innings begins with a play and a miss, very dark clouds and spots of rain overhead
yorker which is dug out back to the bowler
pushes at that one outside the off stump but misses, and it's raining heavily now.
left alone outside the off stump
left alone once again and that wasn't too far from the stump
no shot played to that one and it's a maiden to begin, still raining, umpires giving the shower a chance to pass
no shot played to that one and again it wasn't too far from the stumps
defended back to the bowler
not too far from the edge, nervy start from Ireland
defended into the leg side
flashing drive which is edged for a boundary
beats his again and this time he's bowled, Stirling played across it and his off stump is hit
no shot played to that one once agai
flicked into the leg side, rain seems to have abated
flicked to deep backward square leg
defended into the off side
he leaves that alone, Joyce came into this game in great form, so a lot of hope rests with him you feel
just passes the outside edge
blocked into the covers
pushed towards mid-off
another is let go by to the keeper
driven into the covers and a good start from Kulasekara
another one is left alone
blocked into the off side, yet another dot ball
and the man in great form goes for a duck, a thin edge is found and the keeper takes a simple catch. Ireland in big trouble
flicked to deep backward square
short and it's whacked straight back past the bowler and to the rope
thinks about playing that one but backs out of it and it's through to the keeper
almost finds the edge that time
that one is left alone
again very close to the edge, half hearted appeal for the first slip
played back to the bowler
left well alone and another maiden
thick edge down to third man
played to the man at midwicket
another is left alone, Porterfield can't or won't get bat on ball
he does this time, comes forward and plays a lovely drive through extra cover
pushed into the off side
hit in the air but drops just short of mid-off
poor delivery going down leg and it's helped along its way to the fine leg rope
not too far away from catching an outside edge
turned through a vacant midwicket for a couple
that one is left alone
defended back to the bowler
the Irish captain leaves yet another delivery
pushed towards mid-off
played off the back foot and fielded at short cover
defended into the covers
flicked just in front of square to prevent the maiden
driven well down to the long-off boundary, relieves some pressure
edged down to third man
plays at that but it misses everything and the keeper collects
punched down the ground and good running means it's three
pushed into the off side
defended into the off side
pushed through the off side and to the long-off boundary
big heave but it misses and goes through to the keeper
big swing and it's edged through to the slips and to the rope
pushed into the off side and extra cover fields
cut away but it's  dropped  at backward point by Tharanga
defended back to the bowler
steered down to third man
hit uppishly to mid-of
comes down the pitch and hammers it to long-off
swing and a miss
pushed into the covers
short and it's pulled away to cow corner, lovely shot
defended into the covers
guided to backward point
cut away to backward point
quick single taken in the covers
pushed back to the bowler
pushed back towards the bowler as well
reverse sweep out to deep backward square leg
another lbw appeal but nothing is given and they get a couple
pushed back to the bowler
flicked to the man at short midwicket
defended back to the bowler
cut away to backward point
cut away again but directly to a fielder
single through midwicket
top edge down to third man
defended into the off side
tapped into the midwicket region
blocked back to the bowler
pads and the keeper drops what might have been a catch, although it looked like it just brushed the pads
defended back to the bowler
played to mid-on
defended towards mid-of this time
flicked wristily to deep backward square leg
driven down to long-on
and Mendis strikes, tries to flick it leg side bit he gets caught in front and the umpire raises the finger, big wicket.
flicked away and the short leg Priyanjana  drops  it
defended into the off side
driven well but directly to cover
and pushed back to the bowler
bit of bounce and it nearly finds the edge
awful mix up as Porterfield charges down the track without his partner following, Wilson then sacrifices himself as the bowler mops up the run out
cracked through ther covers
pushed off the back foot and through the covers
more trouble for Ireland as Kevin O'Brien completely misjudges a pull and the man at midwicket takes a simple catch
pushed back to the bowler
gudided down to third man
pushed through the covers
pushed back to the bowler
driven straight down the ground for a single
another defensive shot, Ireland on the rack here
skiddier delivery and Thompson gets caught in his crease, absolutely plum
driven towards long-off
flicked down to fine leg for a single
mis-timed drive back to the bowler
played back to the bowler once again
well driven but directly to mid-off
steered down to third man
misfield at midwicket by Lakmal allows the single
driven well again but finds mid-on this time
flicked into the off side and short leg cuts it off
loops fine off the knee roll and they scramble a run
down the leg side
played back to the bowler
comes down the pitch and drives it to mid-off
guided down to third man
lovely cover drive which races away to the boundary
inisde edge onto the pads, half-hearted appeal by the bowler
played back to the bowler
driven down to long-off
and the skipper finally goes as he slogs it out to deep midwicket and is caught by Perrera
big lbw appeal but nothing is given
another big appeal but again umpire Kettleborough is not for raising the finger
defended into the leg side
pushed towards the bowler
pushed through the covers
blocked away into the off side
almost hit plum on the pads but just gets the bat down in time
flicked very fine and all the way to the rope, ironic cheers from the crowd
mis-timed drive into the covers
defended into the leg side
misses with the cut shot and the keeper collects
pushed softly into the off side
turned through midwicket for a single
turned through the leg side again to deep square leg
down the leg side
pushed back to the bowler
very full delivery which flies past the stumps and through to the keeper
quick single taken towards square leg
quick delivery which the batsman plays all around and his middle stump is hit
turned through the midwicket region
pushed justb wide of mid-off
hit upishly to cover
guided down to third man, cheers for the hundred up
played back to the bowler
played through a vacant midwicket region for a three
short and it's pulled to deep midwicket
left alone but it was pretty close to the stumps
deftly flicked away to the fine leg boundary
pushed to backward point
calmly driven down to long-on for a single
another nice pull from Dockrell again to midwicket
pushed past mid-off and a misfield allows the run
played down to mid-off
flicked in front of square for a couple
driven softly to mid-off
quick single taken to extra cove
defended back towards the bowler
punched through the covers
defended on the back foot back to the keeper
guided down to long-on
goes fine off the pad and they scamper a run
driven to long-on once again
big lbw appeal but the umpire is uninterested
skillfully flicked away to deep midwicket
full ball which is driven to mid-off
mis-timed drive into the covers
quick single to mid-off, fielder couldn't pick it up, may have been a chance
steered down to the third man boundary
driven to mid-off and they take another single
turned to deep backward square leg
defended into the leg side
swept down to deep backward square
pushed to backward point
blocked away into midwicket
gently played to short cover
and the change works instantly, fullish ball which kept a bit low and gets him on the pads, big appeal and the umpire listens to this one
and that was nearly the game as the batsman just evades the outside edge
played back to the bowler on the back foot
again this one is defended
flicked towards mid-on
no shot played there
comes down the pitch and lofts it to long-on for a couple
forward defensive played to that one
top edge off the sweep which lands safely near midwicket
pushed back to the bowler
cut into the covers
driven hard to the covers
swing and a miss outside off
shorter and it's guided down to third man for a single
driven firmly to mid-off
comes down the track and hits a lovely straight which perfectly bisects mid-off and mid-on
deftly flicked to deep midwicket
short and pulled to deep square leg, well stopped by Kulasekara
excellent lofted cover drive from Murtagh and it's one bounce and four
blocked back to the bowler
tries another big shot but doesen't get near it and he's trapped on the pads, Sri Lanka win by 79 runs
